name: The Solar System
description: A deck about The Solar System

flashcards.question: What is the largest planet in our solar system?
What is the closest planet to the Sun?
Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
What is the fifth planet from the sun?
Which planet has the most moons?
What is the smallest planet in our solar system?
Which planet is known for its rings?
What planet is known as the Earth's twin?
Which planet rotates on its side?
Which planet takes the longest to orbit the sun?
